tool.name: qiime feature-table tabulate-seqs
tool.description: - View sequence associated with each feature

param.label: --i-data: ARTIFACT FeatureData[Sequence] The feature sequences to be tabulated. [required]
param.name: idata

tool.help:
View sequence associated with each feature ##########################################
Generate tabular view of feature identifier to sequence mapping, including links to BLAST each sequence against the NCBI nt database.
Parameters ---------- data : FeatureData[Sequence] The feature sequences to be tabulated.
Returns ------- visualization : Visualization
